problems.description: Invalid dependency versions (pytest==0.0.1, requests==0.0.1) causing 'pip install' to fail
Incorrect assertion for multiply (expected 5 instead of 6) causing test failure
Missing 'setuptools' in environment caused 'python setup.py sdist' to fail
Deployment target folder (C:\FakeDeployFolder) may not exist, causing 'xcopy' to fail
Logs directory missing, pipelines assume logs/ exists; created and ensured by auto_test.py
Created a pytest shim in the venv Scripts directory so 'pytest' invoked by the CI batch uses the venv's Python and not global plugins. This prevents plugin compatibility errors.
Ensured the deployment target folder (C:\FakeDeployFolder) exists before running CD to avoid xcopy path errors. auto_test.py will create this folder if missing.
